description: Fix Core API response parsing bug - change Code field type from string to interface{} to handle number values

userStories.title: Fix CoreAPIResponse.Code field type
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to fix the CoreAPIResponse struct to handle numeric code values from Core API.
acceptanceCriteria: Change CoreAPIResponse.Code type from string to interface{}
Update GetAddress function to handle the new type
Update GetIncomeHistory function to handle the new type

userStories.title: Add unit tests for Core API client

acceptanceCriteria: Add test for GetAddress with numeric code response
Add test for GetIncomeHistory with numeric code response
Tests pass with 100% coverage for changed code
